body.name: Vaseline Shea Body Butter Whipped Body Butter Created for Melanin Rich Skin Provides 24 Hour Moisturization for Dry Skin 11 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Designed with influential Black women and fused their knowledge on the unique needs of melanin rich skin with the heritage & expertise of Vaseline to craft Illuminate Me Whipped Body Butter
A light to touch whipped body butter with rich moisturization to achieve a luminous glow with a fragrance that says "I've Arrived."
No need to reapply. Provides all day 24 Hour Moisturization for dry skin
Vaseline Illuminate Me Whipped Body Butter: Made with Glycerin, Responsibly Sourced Shea Butter, and Vaseline Jelly. Formulated without parabens.
Vaseline Illuminate Me Whipped Body Butter Packaging: 100% Recyclable Jar & Lid. Jar made with 30% recycled plastic.
body.description: Vaseline's New Illuminate Me Whipped Body Butter ultra-moisturizes your dry skin leaving it soft, smooth and hydrated. It not only replenishes your skin with deep moisture that penetrates into dry skin but also protects your skin from dryness. Made with responsibly sourced Shea Butter, this light whipped body butter with a pleasant warm fragrance gives a luminous glowing skin. The Vaseline’s NEW Illuminate Me range is designed with influential Black women by serving their need for long-lasting moisture and desire for skin that visibly glows. Feel and see the difference! Benefits include: No need to reapply: Provides 24 Hour Moisturization, formulated without parabens, made with glycerin, Responsibly sourced Shea Butter, and Vaseline Jelly, and Jar is 100% recyclable and made with 35% recycled content. About Vaseline Illuminate Me Skin Care Products: Vaseline co-created with Black women in the spotlight from beauty, sports, and the arts to illuminate your glowing, radiant skin. We fused their knowledge on the unique needs of melanin rich skin with the heritage and skincare expertise of Vaseline to craft Illuminate Me Whipped Body Butter. Delivers rich moisture to skin that lasts all day with a fragrance that says, "I've Arrived." Use With: Apply Shimmering Body Oil after Whipped Body Butter for a hydrated, shimmering glow.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vaseline Illuminate Me Body Butter ultra-moisturizes your dry skin leaving it soft, smooth and hydrated. It not only replenishes your skin with deep moisture that penetrates into dry skin but also protects your skin from dryness.

SKIN CARE FOR EVERY NEED Combine this body butter with other Vaseline products to help heal dry skin. FOR DRY SKIN This body butter provides 24-Hour moisturization for glowing, radiant skin. THE HEALING PROTECTION OF VASELINE JELLY Vaseline Illuminate Me Body Butter contains microdroplets of Vaseline Jelly to lock in moisture. 150 YEARS OF VASELINE No matter what your skin needs, Vaseline has been there to help heal and protect it for the past 150 years .

Vaseline Illuminate Me Shimmering Body Oil, 3.3 oz Vaseline All-Over Body Balm Jelly Stick, 1.4 oz Vaseline Lip Therapy Advanced Healing Main Benefit Vaseline Illuminate Me Shimmering Body Oil illuminates skin with a finishing touch of warm copper shimmer for gorgeous radiance. Vaseline All-Over Body Balm Jelly Stick provides the moisture and efficacy you expect from Vaseline in a convenient, on-the-go hand and body moisturizer stick. Vaseline Original Healing Jelly protects and restores your skin and gives it the extra care it needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For about 10 years now I've used Vaseline lotion from the store and always felt moisturized but also like something was missing. As I got older my skin aged and needed something more nourishing, a lotion that would go deeper than what the store offered and omg have I found it! The scent is amazing and soft, just like a woman should smell (in my own opinion) and the lightweight moisture sinks deep into the skin without feeling greasy. I finally found the best moisturizer for me and I'm never going back to store bought lotion again. ♥️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is definitely worth the hype. I wouldn't say ot is whipped, but it's super smooth which i find to be better. It absorbs to the skin very well, and it gives an little bit of glow to the skin. The smell is not over powering and very pleasant. This is now a staple in my skincare routine as is decibel exceeded my expectation and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not greasy it’s super light and last all day on the skin smells good and have my skin feeling so soft… worth the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I don’t normally write reviews but I just have to say this the best body butter ever. PERIOD! It feels good and smooth and the smell is elegantly illuminating. I used it 5 minutes ago and I feel like I will be sleeping on clouds tonight LOL. My 3 year old daughter said her skin was itchy and I used it on her so no complaints as of right now. If you’re thinking about getting it, BUY IT NOW!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth A Try
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure if this was going to be too greasy and when I opened it up, it looked like it would be, but it sank right into my skin. Has a fragrance (would prefer that it didn't), but it is pleasant and not overpowering. It did give my collar bones a nice glow, but that didn't last too long (but I'm also a bit dehyhdrated so that may be specific to me). I think it is worth a try! Really impressed by how fast it absorbed into my skin and the softness it gave my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dry skin cure
reviews.reviewText: I have really dry skin and nothing has worked for a full day’s worth of moisture besides THIS! I use my regular lotion (for my stretch marks) and then put this one on top. My skin does not feel dry at all by the end of the day. I’m going to buy a back up and it also smells amazing, I love walking into my room after using this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best body butters I used. It’s not greasy at all and absorbs so well into the skin leaving it soft and subtle. Yea, it does leave a nice subtle glow as well. Now there is a slight fragrance to it but once it’s on the skin it goes away after a few minutes. This is something that i definitely will be repurchasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It will radiant your skin
reviews.reviewText: In love with this Vaseline product. Makes my skin extremely soft and shining it also last almost 12 hours and scent is not as strong
